item.title: Sounds Like You Want to Go to a Rave, Dog
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Halo: The MCC has multiplayer issues, CoD: Advanced Warfare releases (and is actually pretty good!), Assassin’s Creed Unity has technical issues, Matt buys a flight stick, Blizzard teases Overwatch and Legacy of the Void at Blizzcon, and more!
